We need to determine relationship between Charles and Donald given many statements. We need to see if one is ancestor/descendant of the other, or they share common ancestor/descendant, etc.

We have statements like "Charles is Jesse's ancestor." So Charles -> ancestor of Jesse. Also "Donald is Michael's ancestor." So Donald -> ancestor of Michael.

We need to see if there is any chain linking Charles and Donald.

We have many relationships; we need to build a directed graph: edge A -> B meaning A is ancestor of B (i.e., A is ancestor, B descendant). Actually statements are of form "X is Y's ancestor" meaning X ancestor of Y. "X is Y's descendant" meaning X descendant of Y (so Y ancestor of X). So we can treat directed edges from ancestor to descendant.

Goal: Determine relationship between Charles and Donald.

We need to see if Charles is ancestor of Donald, descendant, share common ancestor, share common descendant, or none.

- Donald is Michael's ancestor.

Also other statements may connect via other people.

We need to see if there is a path from Charles to Donald (Charles ancestor of Donald) or from Donald to Charles (Donald ancestor of Charles). Or they share a common ancestor (i.e., there exists some person who is ancestor of both). Or share a common descendant (some person descendant of both). Or none.
